title: Ignition System Safety Precautions

body.body: The ignition system produces extremely high voltages.
Do not touch any part of the ignition system or any cables while the engine is running.
An electric shock caused by contact with the ignition system may lead to illness, serious injury or death.
Warning Pacemaker Devices and Ignition System High Voltage
Wearers of surgically implanted heart pacemaker devices should not be in close proximity to ignition circuits and or diagnostic equipment.
The ignition system and any diagnostic equipment may interrupt the normal operation of such devices.
Failure to follow the advice above could result in serious illness or death.
